long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CheckYourFact improves your Reddit browsing experience by protecting you against misinformation. This extension will highlight the reddit post featuring an external link. The links to a reputable, well known information source will marked as such, while links from smaller, less reputable, or known fake news websites will be emphasized in a different color.

To use CheckYourFact, simply add the extension to your browser, and start browsing reddit as your normally would.
